# QPR Software

| foundation = 1991
| location = Helsinki, Finland
| area_served = Over 50 countries
| key_people = Heikki Veijola (CEO) Taru MÃ¤kinen (CFO) Matti Erkheikki (CPO)Mika Maliniemi (CCO)Sanna Salo (CMO)Teemu Lehto (Chief Professional Services)
| industry = Process Mining, Enterprise architecture, Software modeling, Software development, Consulting
| products = [https://www.qpr.com/products/qpr-processanalyzer QPR ProcessAnalyzer], [https://www.qpr.com/products/qpr-enterprisearchitect QPR EnterpriseArchitect], [https://www.qpr.com/products/qpr-processdesigner QPR ProcessDesigner]  [https://www.qpr.com/products/qpr-metrics QPR Metrics]

QPR Software Plc is a Finnish software firm providing management software products in process mining, process and enterprise architecture modelling, and performance management. Founded in 1991 and headquartered in Helsinki, QPR Software is listed on the Helsinki Stock Exchange.
Products
* QPR Process Analyzer, an enterprise-grade software product for advanced process mining
* QPR Enterprise Architect, enterprise architecture modeling software
* QPR Metrics, a tool for measuring strategy execution and performance management, also supporting balanced scorecard methodology
* QPR Process Designer, a tool for quality assurance, business process modelling and Six Sigma software packages
Awards
QPR Software was named a Visionary in the 2025 Gartner Magic Quadrant for Process Mining Platforms for the third consecutive year In 2022.  QPR Software Plc was identified as a "Leader in Process Discovery and Mining in the ISG Provider Lens Intelligent Automation  Solutions and Services 2021 report in the Nordics".
